Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona, you'll be centrally located in Barcelona, steps from Bulevard Rosa and Barcelona Egyptian Museum. This 5-star hotel is close to Casa Batllo and Palau de la Musica Catalana.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 275 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in one of the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and a computer station. Planning an event in Barcelona? This hotel has 6943 square feet (645 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in one of the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Barcelona Egyptian Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi

Casa Batllo - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Museu del Perfume - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Casa Lleo-Morera - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Casa Mila - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Montaner Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Fundacio Sunol - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Fundacio Joan Brossa - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Baro de Quadras Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Francisco Godia Foundation - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Tivoli Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
University of Barcelona - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Room 1

Notice
•Rooms are available for incoming guests from 3 pm. Departure before 12 pm.


In the event that accommodation will be required till 6 pm, the hotel will charge 50% of the applicable contracted rate. After 6 pm, an additional night charge will be made.


•City tax is compulsory and will be charged directly at the front desk of the hotel.


•Picnic box is chargeable and it’s per person per day.


The Catalan government applies a tax regulation for hotel stays in Catalonia. The charges are per person (age 17 and over) per night (up to 7 nights stay) and are applicable by the following scheme: Catalonia: 5* hotel Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 2.48 VAT included 4* hotel Barcelona City 1.21 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Apartments – holiday homes – tourist accommodation Barcelona City 2.48 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.99 VAT included Rest of accommodation types Barcelona City 0.72 VAT included and Rest of Catalonia 0.50 VAT included. Tax is payable directly at the hotel upon arrival.
